channel.title: Rock The World (¿A-Side?)
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Rock The World (¿A-Side?)"

item.title: Re: Rock The World (¿A-Side?)
item.content:encoded: well i was able to get 3 a day by doing tai B-missions everyday with either the RSB redux team or a trapchan-terri-pinky lvl2 team and just using EDUT when possible so now i'm just 1 CD away!

item.title: Re: Rock The World (¿A-Side?)
item.content:encoded:
Completed the corrections in the mission page and in the missions main page. just one thing left… Uzuki can you correct the mission rank in the ninbox and the genbox ? i'm having troubles with the "{$rank} Rank" title. i guess that you can do this mission in the genin rank, but i'm not sure.

about the CLT: i forgot to tell that i already have pink lvl 2, guess that is the center of the confusion. on the other side of the comment i have been doing geeral missions instead of only tai missions for a simple reason: I didin't want to have gen3 nin2 tai4 stats in the arena, so forget about grinding the tai missions. in that scenario of low rock on stage mission probability i got stuck with emosuke on my team to have a chance of droped cds.

item.title: Re: Rock The World (¿A-Side?)
item.content:encoded:
Ananvil: Unlucky. I averaged 6-7 CDs a day doing Tai only missions and peeing on things.

This post is epic.

item.title: Re: Rock The World (¿A-Side?)
item.content:encoded: What exactly are you referring to? No one in this thread said that CLT is Emo-Billy-Stalker. He said he was going to upgrade Billy and Stalker so he could run the B-Rank Rock Out mission.

item.title: Re: Rock The World (¿A-Side?)
item.content:encoded: first off the crazy love triangle bonus isnt emosuke-billy-stalkergirl but pinky-billy-stalkergirl and second if ure trying to get the CDs by just having emosuke in ur party the just forget about it he takes at least 2 days just to get a CD u might as well do Rock Out mission if epic peeing and hope u dont lose( think the mission has a 20% or so chance of dropping so the epic peeing should make it automatic drop)

item.title: Re: Rock The World (¿A-Side?)
item.content:encoded: Edited the first post to complete the mission. Obviously after becoming lvl 2 Emosuke droped 4 cd's in 6 missions, nothing less could be spected. tomorrow i upgrade billy and stalker, the crazy love triangle is going to start some harvesting!

item.title: Re: Rock The World (¿A-Side?)
item.content:encoded: Unlucky. I averaged 6-7 CDs a day doing Tai only missions and peeing on things.

item.title: Re: Rock The World (¿A-Side?)
item.content:encoded: Is it a rare mission? I've spent 2 days doing B-ranks and one day doing tai specific b ranks. Am I missing something? I haven't seen the Rock out on stage mission once.

item.title: Re: Rock The World (¿A-Side?)
item.content:encoded: You can try for the B-Rank Rock Out on Stage with Epic Dog Urination Technique. That's how I got the CDs I needed.

item.title: Re: Rock The World (¿A-Side?)
item.content:encoded: I officialy HATE Emosuke and his emo cd's. i have done 40 missions and get NOT EVEN A SINGLE CD. At east i am not the number 2 in my rank today and the mission is still open in the special missions menu. It is just a matter of time, altough there all be easy using the ro-sham-bo redux team.

item.title: Re: Rock The World (¿A-Side?)
item.content:encoded:
It looks great! I cant wait to get stamina points and farm those emo CD's hopefully i will get emosuke lvl 2. Or… maybe i will get Emosuke lvl 1.5? O_o

I guess that emosuke say he's second to Itachi. is that right?

item.title: Rock The World (¿A-Side?)
item.content:encoded:
Today i got the second rank in special jonin and got this message:

"You were your rank's Number Two player! Check the Special Missions!"

in the special missions menu appeared this:






Finally Got the CD's!
Here is the rest


I finally have Emosuke lvl 2!!!

Till there the success messages are the same than the b-side mission tomorrow i will post the success message for the last part of the mission.
